parameters.query: select ac.*, c.company_name, (select max(ri.end_date) from report_import ri where ri.company_id=c.company_id and ri.campaign_yandex_id=ac.campaign_yandex_id and ri.processed_date IS not null) max_imported from active_company_adv_campaigns ac, companies c where ac.company_id=c.company_id AND ac.is_active=true  order by ac.company_id

nodes.name: Send a status message for completed workflows

main.node: Send a status message for completed workflows
